<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                Snippets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When spilling a virtual register, we also spill any snippets it is connected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to. The snippets are small live ranges that only have a single real use,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// leftovers from live range splitting. Spilling them enables memory operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// folding or tightens the live range around the single use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This minimizes register pressure and maximizes the store-to-load distance for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spill slots which can be important in tight loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// isSnippet - Identify if a live interval is a snippet that should be spilled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is assumed that SnipLI is a virtual register with the same original as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Edit-&gt;getReg().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InlineSpiller::isSnippet(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;SnipLI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = Edit-&gt;getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A snippet is a tiny live range with only a single instruction using it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// besides copies to/from Reg or spills/fills.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Exception is done for statepoint instructions which will fold fills</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into their operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We accept:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InlineSpiller::isSibling(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is beneficial to spill to earlier place in the same BB in case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// There is an alternative def earlier in the same MBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Hoist the spill as far as possible in SpillMBB. This can ease</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// register pressure:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   x = def</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   y = use x</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   s = copy x</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Hoisting the spill of s to immediately after the def removes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// interference between x and y:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   x = def</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   spill x</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   y = use killed x</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This hoist only helps when the copy kills its source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InlineSpiller::hoistSpillInsideBB(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;SpillLI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;CopyMI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InlineSpiller::canGuaranteeAssignmentAfterRemat(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> VReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#aa6d594f20f477b54afc0381268ddd347">RestrictStatepointRemat</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here&#39;s a quick explanation of the problem we&#39;re trying to handle here:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; There are some pseudo instructions with more vreg uses than there are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   physical registers on the machine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; This is normally handled by spilling the vreg, and folding the reload</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   into the user instruction.  (Thus decreasing the number of used vregs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   until the remainder can be assigned to physregs.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; However, since we may try to spill vregs in any order, we can end up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   trying to spill each operand to the instruction, and then rematting it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   instead.  When that happens, the new live intervals (for the remats) are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   expected to be trivially assignable (i.e. RS&#95;Done).  However, since we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   may have more remats than physregs, we&#39;re guaranteed to fail to assign</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At the moment, we only handle this for STATEPOINTs since they&#39;re the only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pseudo op where we&#39;ve seen this.  If we start seeing other instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the same problem, we need to revisit this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() != TargetOpcode::STATEPOINT)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For STATEPOINTs we allow re-materialization for fixed arguments only hoping</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that number of physical registers is enough to cover all fixed arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it is not true we need to revisit it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/statepointopers">StatepointOpers</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>).getVarIdx(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">                EndIdx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">       Idx &lt; EndIdx; ++Idx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(Idx);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Remove redundant spills in the same BB. Save those redundant spills in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// SpillsToRm, and save the spill to keep and its BB in SpillBBToSpill map.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HoistSpillHelper::rmRedundantSpills(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, 16&gt;</a> &amp;Spills,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;, MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;SpillBBToSpill) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each spill saw, check SpillBBToSpill&#91;&#93; and see if its BB already has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// another spill inside. If a BB contains more than one spill, only keep the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// earlier spill with smaller SlotIndex.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentSpill : Spills) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;PrevSpill = SpillBBToSpill&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PrevSpill) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> PIdx = LIS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervals/#a6f3043b29023d270fc4bc5062dff7cee">getInstructionIndex</a>(&#42;PrevSpill);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> CIdx = LIS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervals/#a6f3043b29023d270fc4bc5062dff7cee">getInstructionIndex</a>(&#42;CurrentSpill);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;SpillToRm = (CIdx &gt; PIdx) ? CurrentSpill : PrevSpill;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;SpillToKeep = (CIdx &gt; PIdx) ? PrevSpill : CurrentSpill;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillsToRm.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(SpillToRm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillBBToSpill&#91;MDT.getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>)&#93; = SpillToKeep;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillBBToSpill&#91;MDT.getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>)&#93; = CurrentSpill;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SpillToRm : SpillsToRm)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Spills.erase(SpillToRm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Starting from \\p Root find a top-down traversal order of the dominator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tree to visit all basic blocks containing the elements of \\p Spills.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Redundant spills will be found and put into \\p SpillsToRm at the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// time. \\p SpillBBToSpill will be populated as part of the process and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// maps a basic block to the first store occurring in the basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\post SpillsToRm.union(Spills\\@post) == Spills\\@pre</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HoistSpillHelper::getVisitOrders(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Root, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, 16&gt;</a> &amp;Spills,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Orders,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;, MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;SpillBBToSpill) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The set contains all the possible BB nodes to which we may hoist</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original spills.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;, 8&gt;</a> WorkSet;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Save the BB nodes on the path from the first BB node containing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-redundant spill to the Root node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;, 8&gt;</a> NodesOnPath;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All the spills to be hoisted must originate from a single def instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the OrigReg. It means the def instruction should dominate all the spills</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be hoisted. We choose the BB where the def instruction is located as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the Root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42;RootIDomNode = MDT&#91;Root&#93;-&gt;getIDom();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For every node on the dominator tree with spill, walk up on the dominator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tree towards the Root node until it is reached. If there is other node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// containing spill in the middle of the path, the previous spill saw will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be redundant and the node containing it will be removed. All the nodes on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the path starting from the first node with non-redundant spill to the Root</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node will be added to the WorkSet, which will contain all the possible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// locations where spills may be hoisted to after the loop below is done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Spill : Spills) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/siinstrflags/#a63fe1ccb8fc5f327a64d2977fce181ecaa444d6850530e37d8af98558ce5b25f5">Spill</a>-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a> = MDT&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;SpillToRm = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Node != RootIDomNode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Node dominates Block, and it already contains a spill, the spill in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Block will be redundant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Node != MDT&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>&#93; &amp;&amp; SpillBBToSpill&#91;Node&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SpillToRm = SpillBBToSpill&#91;MDT&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>&#93;&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        /// If we see the Node already in WorkSet, the path from the Node to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        /// the Root node must already be traversed by another spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">        /// Then no need to repeat.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WorkSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(Node)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NodesOnPath.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(Node);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;getIDom();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SpillToRm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillsToRm.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(SpillToRm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add a BB containing the original spills to SpillsToKeep -- i.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set the initial status before hoisting start. The value of BBs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// containing original spills is set to 0, in order to descriminate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with BBs containing hoisted spills which will be inserted to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SpillsToKeep later during hoisting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillsToKeep&#91;MDT&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>&#93;&#93; = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WorkSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(NodesOnPath.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#abf73a826b5d6f739eb4af48ddf14c5b4">begin</a>(), NodesOnPath.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a7004354fbee1c8cd74ed9001915e1db5">end</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort the nodes in WorkSet in top-down order and save the nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in Orders. Orders will be used for hoisting in runHoistSpills.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> idx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Orders.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(MDT.getNode(Root));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a> = Orders&#91;idx++&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42;Child : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;children()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WorkSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(Child))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Orders.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Child);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SpillsToKeep contains all the nodes where spills are to be inserted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// during hoisting. If the spill to be inserted is an original spill</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  rmRedundantSpills(Spills, SpillsToRm, SpillBBToSpill);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SpillsInSubTreeMap keeps the map from a dom tree node to a pair of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nodes set and the cost of all the spills inside those nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The nodes set are the locations where spills are to be inserted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the subtree of current node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">NodesCostPair =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::pair&lt;SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;, 16&gt;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;, NodesCostPair&gt;</a> SpillsInSubTreeMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate Orders set in reverse order, which will be a bottom-up order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the dominator tree. Once we visit a dom tree node, we know its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// children have already been visited and the spill locations in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subtrees of all the children have been determined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#af6a3df9bf4da2b9af52a9ad973e6f30c">SmallVector&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;, 32&gt;::reverse&#95;iterator</a> RIt = Orders.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a23aab542398091e1fcfd46b6006d64ac">rbegin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; RIt != Orders.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad696953257cf1c4e5bd12d02146e7287">rend</a>(); RIt++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> = (&#42;RIt)-&gt;getBlock();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1530"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Block contains an original spill, simply continue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1532"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SpillsToKeep.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a836d9cba6deced0bb1fa7333ce5afd3a">contains</a>(&#42;RIt) &amp;&amp; !SpillsToKeep&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;.first.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#adb33f3ede2f5bfc9b3ee658aaf648492">insert</a>(&#42;RIt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1534"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;.second contains the cost of spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1535"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;.second = MBFI.getBlockFreq(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1536"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1537"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1538"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1539"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Collect spills in subtree of current node (&#42;RIt) to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1540"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;.first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42;Child : (&#42;RIt)-&gt;children()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1542"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SpillsInSubTreeMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a836d9cba6deced0bb1fa7333ce5afd3a">contains</a>(Child))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The stmt &quot;SpillsInSubTree = SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;.first&quot; below</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should be placed before getting the begin and end iterators of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1546"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;Child&#93;.first, or else the iterators may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1547"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// invalidated when SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93; is seen the first time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the map grows and then the original buckets in the map are moved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;, 16&gt;</a> &amp;SpillsInSubTree =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> &amp;SubTreeCost = SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SubTreeCost += SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;Child&#93;.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BI = SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;Child&#93;.first.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a50d461a887e200e704e5157d3b21514d">begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EI = SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;Child&#93;.first.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillsInSubTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(BI, EI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillsInSubTreeMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a1eb8504bab5f794778d82db6ac829923">erase</a>(Child);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineDomTreeNode &#42;, 16&gt;</a> &amp;SpillsInSubTree =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> &amp;SubTreeCost = SpillsInSubTreeMap&#91;&#42;RIt&#93;.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No spills in subtree, simply continue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SpillsInSubTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#af8a50544090e81ac83601aff8f4b0142">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether Block is a possible candidate to insert spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> LiveReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isSpillCandBB(OrigLI, OrigVNI, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>, LiveReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are multiple spills that could be merged, bias a little</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to hoist the spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> MarginProb = (SpillsInSubTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#a0e1c3175b0ac22fe3853651c28e1ecb8">size</a>() &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a>(9, 10)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a>(1, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SubTreeCost &gt; MBFI.getBlockFreq(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) &#42; MarginProb) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hoist: Move spills to current Block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><span class="doxyHighlight">      for (auto &#42;const SpillBB : SpillsInSubTree) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When SpillBB is a BB contains original spill, insert the spill</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to SpillsToRm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (auto It = SpillsToKeep.find(SpillBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><span class="doxyHighlight">            It != SpillsToKeep.end() &amp;&amp; !It-&gt;second) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MachineInstr &#42;SpillToRm = SpillBBToSpill&#91;SpillBB&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SpillsToRm.push&#95;back(SpillToRm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SpillBB will not contain spill anymore, remove it from SpillsToKeep.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SpillsToKeep.erase(SpillBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Current Block is the BB containing the new hoisted spill. Add it to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SpillsToKeep. LiveReg is the source of the new spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SpillsToKeep&#91;&#42;RIt&#93; = LiveReg;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For spills with equal values, remove redundant spills and hoist those left</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to less hot spots.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Spills with equal values will be collected into the same set in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// MergeableSpills when spill is inserted. These equal spills are originated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from the same defining instruction and are dominated by the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Before hoisting all the equal spills, redundant spills inside in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BB are first marked to be deleted. Then starting from the spills left, walk</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// up on the dominator tree towards the Root node where the define instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is located, mark the dominated spills to be deleted along the way and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// collect the BB nodes on the path from non-dominated spills to the define</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instruction into a WorkSet. The nodes in WorkSet are the candidate places</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// where we are considering to hoist the spills. We iterate the WorkSet in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// bottom-up order, and for each node, we will decide whether to hoist spills</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// inside its subtree to that node. In this way, we can get benefit locally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// even if hoisting all the equal spills to one cold place is impossible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinespiller-cpp-/hoistspillhelper/#a597bb5d7ef9a22f44dbe867d8eaa7fd6"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinespiller-cpp-/hoistspillhelper/#a597bb5d7ef9a22f44dbe867d8eaa7fd6">HoistSpillHelper::hoistAllSpills</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For VirtReg clone, the \\p New register should have the same physreg or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// stackslot as the \\p old register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinespiller-cpp-/hoistspillhelper/#ad395a85b9e11855611ae547a3d332b8f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-inlinespiller-cpp-/hoistspillhelper/#ad395a85b9e11855611ae547a3d332b8f">HoistSpillHelper::LRE&#95;DidCloneVirtReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> New, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Old) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VRM.hasPhys(Old))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VRM.assignVirt2Phys(New, VRM.getPhys(Old));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VRM.getStackSlot(Old) != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/virtregmap/#ad2e99ae080aa934d64b0ff504dab0158">VirtRegMap::NO&#95;STACK&#95;SLOT</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VRM.assignVirt2StackSlot(New, VRM.getStackSlot(Old));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;VReg should be assigned either physreg or stackslot&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VRM.hasShape(Old))</span></CodeLine>
